name: Policenauts Pilot Disk
summary:
The Policenauts Pilot Disk is relatively unknown. In content wise, it's nearly identical to the PSX Policenauts Private Collection, but has a few different things that warrant a look...

The Policenauts Pilot Disk was released a few months ahead of the full release on the 3DO.It was basically broken unto 5 sections: Game, Movie, Database, Making of and Sound.
